data.name: Project Valkyrie
data.detailed_description:
Synopsis:
- Trying to keep yourself alive in the coming apocalypse, you will find an underground refuge. Will it be safer than a scorched surface or will it become a nightmare trap? To know for sure, you'll have to go deeper through the darkness.


Description
"Project Valkyrie" is a VR adventure in the genre of horror, which offers to go to a mysterious bunker, with entire blocks of rooms, dark corridors, and with its mysteries and secrets. Explore the underground complex of Newberry Hills and find out the reason for the disappearance of all inhabitants. Puzzles, a wrenching atmosphere and a frightening unknown behind each door. How far will you move in the gloom?
Features:
-Play time from 40 to 90 minutes
-Interest puzzles
-Ability to dive into the last moments of life of the inhabitants
-Atmosphere holding in stress to the end

data.short_description: "Project Valkyrie" is history that you have to see for youself

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8GB ОЗУ MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 12 GB ОЗУ MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1070 / AMD RX 590 - 8GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
